Class Quiz

java.lang.Object
Quiz
public class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
The Quiz class is a collection of FlashCards that tests the user on their knowledge of a topic.
See Also:
FlashCard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Quiz​(java.io.File file)
    A constructor for the Quiz class that imports information from a previously exported file.
    Quiz​(java.lang.String aName)
    Constructs a Quiz with the specified name.
    Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, int aNumQuestionsToShow, java.util.Set<FlashCard> aFlashCards)
    Constructs a Quiz with the specified name, the number of questions to show, and the set containing the FlashCards.
    Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, java.util.Set<FlashCard> aFlashCards)
    Constructs a Quiz with the specified name using the provided set of FlashCards.
    Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, Tag aTag)
    Constructs a Quiz with the specified name using the set of FlashCards with the specified Tag.

  • Constructor Details

    • Quiz

      public Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, int aNumQuestionsToShow, java.util.Set<FlashCard> aFlashCards)
      Constructs a Quiz with the specified name, the number of questions to show, and the set containing the FlashCards.
      Parameters:
      aName - The name of the Quiz.
      aNumQuestionsToShow - The number of questions to show on the quiz. Must be less than or equal to the number of FlashCards.
      aFlashCards - A Set containing the FlashCards used in the Quiz.

    • Quiz

      public Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, java.util.Set<FlashCard> aFlashCards)
      Constructs a Quiz with the specified name using the provided set of FlashCards.
      Parameters:
      aName - The name of the Quiz.
      aFlashCards - A Set containing the FlashCards used in the Quiz.

    • Quiz

      public Quiz​(java.lang.String aName, Tag aTag)
      Constructs a Quiz with the specified name using the set of FlashCards with the specified Tag.
      Parameters:
      aName - The name of the Quiz.
      aTag - A Tag relating to FlashCards.

    • Quiz

      public Quiz​(java.lang.String aName)
      Constructs a Quiz with the specified name.
      Parameters:
      aName - The name of the Quiz.

    • Quiz

      public Quiz​(java.io.File file)
      A constructor for the Quiz class that imports information from a previously exported file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file that contains the Quiz information.

  • Method Details

    • setName

      public boolean setName​(java.lang.String aName)
      Changes the name of the Quiz.
      Parameters:
      aName - The new name of the Quiz.
      Returns:
      True if the name was changed. False otherwise.

    • setNumQuestionsToShow

      public boolean setNumQuestionsToShow​(int aNumQuestionsToShow)
      Sets the number of questions to show. Must be at least 0 and less than or equal to the number of FlashCards.
      Parameters:
      aNumQuestionsToShow - The number of questions.
      Returns:
      True if the value was set. False otherwise.
